item.title: WooCommerce 2016 core wishlist
item.description:
WooCommerce 2016 core wishlist

With 2015 and 2.5 (almost) out of the way, we've started looking forward to 2016 and the next major release. WC 2.6 has already been partially roadmapped on Github and on our roadmap Trello board, but what we do after that is not yet certain I asked some of our WooCommerce devs what they wanted to see realised...
